name: Wildman: An "Evolutionary" Action RPG (Canceled)
blurb: Crush your enemies in this original action role-playing game from Gas Powered Games

rewards.reward: FORUM EDITION: Thank you for supporting this project! This edition gives you immediate posting access to the Wildman forum when the Kickstarter has completed; non-backers will only have read-only access. (Note: All amounts above $5 already receive full forum access.)

BETA EDITION: This edition gives you exclusive access to the pre-release Wildman beta. Once Wildman is released, you will no longer be able to play the game without purchasing a full-price copy. This edition also includes forum access. (Note: All amounts above $10 will receive beta access.)

DIGITAL EDITION: Thank you for supporting this project! Backing the project at this level gives you 1 digital copy of the game, available for download the day the game is released. You also receive immediate posting access to the Wildman forum.

MUSIC LOVERS EDITION: This edition adds a downloadable version of the soundtrack and 1 extra copy of the DIGITAL EDITION to give to a friend. It also includes everything else from the DIGITAL EDITION.

25% OFF! FOR EARLY BACKERS ONLY! DIGITAL COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION: This adds a digital \u201cMaking of Wildman\u201d development and art book; a digital novella set in the world of Wildman; a 720P digital version of the \u201cMaking of Wildman\u201d documentary; early exclusive access to the Beta for Wildman; a backer exclusive in-game \u201cConsumables Pack;\u201d a unique Wildman form with special abilities, and 1 additional copy of the DIGITAL EDITION, for a grand total of 2 extra copies. It also includes everything else from the MUSIC LOVERS EDITION. This is a limited time offer; get it while it\u2019s hot!

DIGITAL COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION: This adds a digital \u201cMaking of Wildman\u201d development and art book; a digital novella set in the world of Wildman; a 720P digital version of the \u201cMaking of Wildman\u201d documentary; early exclusive access to the Beta for Wildman; a Kickstarter exclusive in-game \u201cConsumables Pack;\u201d a unique Wildman form with special abilities, and 1 additional copy of the DIGITAL EDITION, for a grand total of 2 extra copies. It also includes everything else from the MUSIC LOVERS EDITION.

VIP FORUM EDITION: This edition grants you VIP forum access, which lets you vote on weekly design questions and grants you a special forum tag and badge. It also includes everything else from the DIGITAL COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION.

EXCLUSIVE TESTER EDITION: This edition gives you the opportunity to test Wildman at the offices of Gas Powered Games in Redmond, Washington before it reaches the public. At the end of the day, you can share your ideas with the team. We will be quite flexible with dates; however, you will be responsible for your own travel and accommodations. Lunch is on us. This edition also includes everything from the VIP FORUM EDITION. (Note: Everyone pledging above this will also be able to take advantage of this opportunity.)

20% OFF! FOR EARLY BACKERS ONLY! BOXED COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION: This edition adds a high-quality boxed copy of the game, a physical \u201cMaking of Wildman\u201d DVD, the soundtrack on CD, a printed edition of the Wildman novella, an art print, and an in-game \u201cSpecial Thanks\u201d credit, and 3 additional copies of the DIGITAL EDITION for a grand total of 5 extra copies. It is also includes everything else from the DIGITAL COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION. This is a limited time offer; get it while it\u2019s hot!

BOXED COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION: This edition adds a high-quality boxed copy of the game, a physical \u201cMaking of Wildman\u201d DVD, the soundtrack on CD, a printed edition of the Wildman novella, an art print, and an in-game \u201cSpecial Thanks\u201d credit, and 3 additional copies of the DIGITAL EDITION for a grand total of 5 extra copies. It also includes everything else from the DIGITAL COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION.

COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION: This edition adds a hardcover version of the \u201cMaking of Wildman\u201d development and art book, a backer-exclusive T-shirt, a Wildman poster, and 5 additional copies of the DIGITAL EDITION for a grand total of 10 extra copies. It is also includes everything else from the BOXED COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION.

SIGNATURE EDITION: This edition adds an art print signed by the artist; and versions of the Wildman development book, poster, and a game box signed by the team. You\u2019ll also be able to add a name of your own creation to the pool of randomly generated enemy champions. It also includes everything else from the COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION.

PERSONAL EDITION: This edition adds a special \u201cGold Level\u201d in-game credit and a personalized in-game weapon (your choice of name) that goes into the loot table. It also includes everything else from the SIGNATURE EDITION.

ANIMATED EDITION: This edition adds an exclusive animation for your Wildman character, and you\u2019ll be able to add a name to one of the randomly generated names for the War Zones. It also includes everything else from the PERSONAL EDITION.

VIDEO EDITION: This edition lets you be featured in a video blog and spend a day with Chris Taylor and the Wildman development team at Gas Powered Games. It also includes everything else from the ANIMATED EDITION.

EXECUTIVE EDITION: This edition gives you an invitation to the launch party for Wildman, which is awesome because it means we\u2019ll have a launch party; you\u2019ll also appear in a special launch video blog; and you\u2019ll receive an \u201cExecutive Producer\u201d credit. It also includes everything else from the VIDEO EDITION
